thread.title: new drone videos show apple’s campus 2 headquarters nearing completion
thread.title_full: new drone videos show apple’s campus 2 headquarters nearing completion

author: philip stevens I designboom
title: new drone videos show apple’s campus 2 headquarters nearing completion
text:
new drone videos show apple's campus 2 headquarters nearing completion jan 06, 2017 new drone videos show apple's campus 2 headquarters nearing completion 

two new drone videos, both taken on christmas day, show the current state of apple’s vast new headquarters as it races towards completion. once finalized, the 260,000 square meter offices — designed by british architect norman foster — will also house a 1,000-seat auditorium, an on-site power plant, underground parking, and a company fitness center. at the heart of the design, a central garden will offer the company’s employees outdoor dining areas surrounded by freshly planted trees. 
the vast complex has been designed by british firm foster + partners video and image courtesy of matthew roberts 


the first video, filmed by aerial videography enthusiast matthew roberts , shows the scale of the scheme’s rooftop solar panels (estimated to be 65% complete), and the development of the surrounding neighborhood, particularly along tantau avenue. the second film, shot by duncan sinfield , tours the quiet site on christmas day as construction work stopped for the holiday. it is clear from the footage that the majority of work is currently taking place inside the facility, with employees expected to move in later in 2017. 
the land at the center of the ‘spaceship’ will eventually form a central garden with freshly planted treesimage courtesy of matthew roberts 
the scheme’s rooftop solar panels are estimated to be 65% completeimage courtesy of matthew roberts
